name: Bubble Rainbow 7
description:
Penguins vs Walrus

You are the Penguin and you need to escape the walrus. They want to send you to place far away.

Play it with me LIVE on Twitch

https://www.twitch.tv/unterhoch3

YOU are the Penguin
  • Escape the Walrus.
  • Colllect the Bubblewrap to save your friends.
  • Collect Fish to gain health
YOU are the Walrus

Get rid of the Penguins. Shoot them with your laser you ate. The Penguins are evil.  (from walrusfan3)

Round 3 Minutes
Infos about the Game
  • hectic game
  • flee and do not get caught
  • hunt the penguins
  • collect bubblewrap
